body:
If you have an Avicus/Minecraft YouTube account and need a YouTube avatar or thumbnail, apply using the format below. REQUESTS NOT USING THE FORMAT WILL NOT BE DONE

Please be specific. :)

YouTube account name and link:
What do you want the text to say? Will it include your name?
What position do you want your skin to be in?
Background (scenery, swords, colors, etc.)?
Thumbnail or avatar?

People already done


Examples:

replies.body:
YouTube account name and link: MustardProductions
What do you want the text to say? Will it include your name? MustardProrductions in any font orange text at the bottom.
What position do you want your skin to be in? In the air holding a sword with two hands.
Background (scenery, swords, colors, etc.)? The sword I'm holding is a diamond sword. Also, can I be on an island?
Thumbnail or avatar? Avatar.
